categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Evan Zorn was a male Human who served as a private in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, he was stationed at Frostwake Outpost on the planet Hoth, distributing weapons to other Imperial forces.
Private Zorn appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Weapons Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
